title: yAke bandyO
sahitya:
yAkE bandyO jIvavE vyarthavAga jnAnadindali tiLidu para gatiyanu koDu


caraNam 1    dAnava mADalillA dharmava mADalillA dina nuDigaLillA dAkSiNyavillA 
jnAni dAsa janara sangadoniralillA mana nirmaladi kSaNavu iralilla
    caraNam 2    sati puruSarAgi santOSadinidarillA yatiyAgi tIrtta yAtreya mADalillA 
shruti purANagaLannu cevikoTTi kELalillA mrtikAla bandu dina vyarta huidalla
    caraNam 3    luNTuTTi sukhavilla kAya pariNAmavill koNDu koTTIparasEve biDalillA 
danduga samsAra mAyApAsha koLagAdE kande shrI purandara viTTalana nene kaNDya
